content.task: Define systematic approach to fix 15+ pytest.skip violations without bypassing tests. Target files: tests/unit/test_stellar_exchange_contract.py (5 violations), tests/adapted/test_stellar_components_adapted.py (10+ violations), tests/testnet/test_stellar_testnet.py (module skip), tests/integration/test_performance_benchmarks.py (1 violation). Need proper test infrastructure solutions, not bypasses.
content.context: Context: DEVELOPMENT_RULES.md strictly prohibits test bypassing. Previous violations used pytest.skip for "API integration needed", "testnet connectivity", "account validation issues". Must implement proper test doubles, mocking, and infrastructure instead of skipping tests that reveal real issues.
